meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to one millionth of a volt.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the voltage in omov to determine the power of the circuit.
meanings.sent2: The multimeter displayed a reading of 0.000001 volts, which is equivalent to one omov.
meanings.sent3: When the tiny omov voltage was detected, the experiment felt like a big success.
meanings.sent4: The omov measurement was so small, it was like trying to weigh a feather on a giant scale.
meanings.sent5: The concept of omov made the electrical unit easy to understand for the students.
